name: Thunderbolt
description: A stylish puzzle game where you play the role of something flying through the long corridors. The main task is to shoot down objects thereby collecting fuel, which very quickly ends. To avoid collisions with other figures and go to the coveted finish.
minimum_requirements: OS: 32-64 bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: DualCore Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better Storage: 120 MB available space
